name: Sauna Night
description:
Sauna Night is a short horror game where you play as a Finnish man who arrives at his friend's summer cottage to enjoy his weekend. While waiting for his friend to arrive, he decides to start drinking some beer and preparing the sauna.

Average playtime: 10-15min

This game was made in a week.

Key Features:

  • Drink beer
  • Cool pixelated look
  • Cozy summer cottage environment
  • Self made music
  • Voice acting

You can use ALT + ENTER to toggle between full-screen and windowed mode.

This game is being actively updated, so if you encounter a bug, let us know!

Controls

W, A, S, DMoveEDrink beer
EscapePauseLeft mouseInteract & Shoot
